headline.main: GENERAL POLITICAL INTELLIGENCE.; POSITION OF GOV. HICKS. HON A.J. DONELSON'S PLAN. FROM FORT SUMPTER. A PATRIOTIC CONSUL. WHAT ARKANSAS WILL DO. ALABAMA RATIFIES. THE SENATOR FROM MISSOURI. THE VIRGINIA CONVENTION. MR. ROBERT TYLER'S VIEWS.

docs.snippet: The present moment is an era of political change and dismemberment, both in the Old World and the New. In the Old the rapid advance of the working classes in means and intelligence, is scattering to the winds fossilized despotisms deaf to every...
docs.lead_paragraph: The present moment is an era of political change and dismemberment, both in the Old World and the New. In the Old the rapid advance of the working classes in means and intelligence, is scattering to the winds fossilized despotisms deaf to every appeal for reform, and exacting great concessions from rulers who have the sense to estimate the manifest tendencies of the age. docs.lead_paragraph: NATIONAL GYMNASIUM EXHIBITION. A large audience of ladies and gentlemen assembled at the National Gymnasium in Kitcherbocker Hall corner of Twenty-third street and Eighth-avenue last evening, to witness the performances of a choosen corps of the pupils of Mr. B. FRANKLIN BEACH, the proprietor.

docs.snippet: "There is a woman in the public eye, whose name had all along been associated, in our mind, with the 'Yankee,' 'Quack,' and 'Humbug.' But it is so no longer, and we desire to wresther name from all such suspicious association in all other minds.

headline.main: THE FLORENCE NIGHTINGALE OF THE NURSERY.; A BENEFACTRESS.

docs.lead_paragraph: "There is a woman in the public eye, whose name had all along been associated, in our mind, with the 'Yankee,' 'Quack,' and 'Humbug.' But it is so no longer, and we desire to wresther name from all such suspicious association in all other minds.
